alert.note: Alert for Howard; Winneshiek (Iowa) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS LaCrosse (Southwestern Wisconsin, Southeastern Minnesota, and Northeast Iowa)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 04 at 6:16PM CDT by NWS LaCrosse
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Howard, northern Winneshiek and southern Fillmore Counties through 645 PM CDT... At 615 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Harmony, or 8 miles south of Preston. This storm was nearly stationary. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and torrential rainfall with rates of 1 to 3 inches per hour. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Heavy rainfall could lead to brief localized flooding. Locations impacted include... Decorah, Cresco, Preston, Harmony, Mabel, Lanesboro, Lime Springs, Wykoff, Canton, Highland, Cherry Grove, Bristol, Newburg, Amherst, York, Carimona, Whalan, Vernon Springs County Park, Forestville State Park and Vernon Springs. People attending Buffalo Bill Days should be prepared to seek shelter if necessary. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
